title: BankSimulator
description: A system where you can simulate a basic bank. You can create you account, withdraw and deposit money

title: LibraryManager
description: A system for managing library books, including adding new books, deleting books, and viewing book details.

title: MovieTickets
description: A system for managing a cinema, including CRUD movies, CRUD cinema room, you can make reservation, CRUD user system

title: TextEncryptor
description: A system where you can encrypt and decrypt a text

title: RPG-Game
description: A basic RPG game using C, you have some enemies and some boost items and you can save the game map

title: Guess Number
description: A basic project where you have to guess a random number having 3 difficulty levels

title: Password Manager
description: This project is a simple password manager built in C#. It allows users to securely store and manage their passwords using encryption. Store and manage multiple passwords. Encrypt and decrypt passwords for enhanced security. User-friendly graphical interface for easy management.

title: Scientific Calculator
description: This project is a scientific calculator built in C#. It provides a user-friendly interface for performing a range of mathematical operations, including advanced functions such as trigonometric and logarithmic calculations.

title: Note Organizer
description: This project is a note organizer application built in C#. It allows users to create, edit, and manage notes efficiently with a user-friendly interface.

title: BankSimulator
description: A system for managing bank accounts, allowing users to create accounts, deposit and withdraw funds, and check account balances.

title: Cinema Manager
description: A system for managing a cinema, including CRUD movies, CRUD cinema room, you can make reservation, CRUD user system

title: Library Manager
description: A system for managing library books, including adding new books, deleting books, and viewing book details.

title: Guess Number
description: A basic game where you have to guess a random number having 3 difficulty levels, The game is created using POO

title: Budget Tracker
description: This is a simple Java application that helps you track and manage your personal expenses. The Budget Tracker allows users to add, view, and manage their expenses in a user-friendly way.

title: Task Manager
description: This Java project is a simple Task Manager that allows users to create, manage, and track tasks.

title: Trivia
description: A basic trivia game where you can add questions and give answers. The game was made using POO

title: Password Generator
description: A simple project that will generate you a random password

title: Website for Guesthouses (unfinished)
description: I have created a website for guesthouses, where users can book rooms for a specific period. I was about to implement an admin panel where rooms can be added and removed, as well as a gallery system for the rooms.

title: Restaurant Website
description: I have created a website for a restaurant that includes a digital menu, an ordering system, and an admin panel where orders can be viewed, and products can be added, deleted, or edited.

title: Restaurant app(unfinished)
description: I have created a prototype for a restaurant app that features a digital menu with prices, and includes a login/registration system with password recovery via email. I was about to implement the permissions system and the ordering system.

title: Maze Runner - Maze Escape
description: This project is a maze escape game built using Unity. Players navigate through a maze to find the exit, testing their problem-solving skills and spatial awareness.

title: Maze Runner - Laboratory Escape
description: This project is a maze escape game developed using Unity. In this game, players navigate through a laboratory-themed maze to find the exit, solving puzzles and avoiding obstacles along the way.
